If, when compiling openssl-0.9.7 according to the instructions in the BLFS Book, you get an error as in this transcript: prompt $ sed '/=head1 *NAME/,+2s/passwd/openssl-passwd/' \ doc/apps/passwd.pod > doc/apps/openssl-passwd.pod sed: -e expression #1, char 16: Unexpected ','
You can upgrade sed to 4.05 to fix it.
